description.en:
For 52 years, Takumi Fujimura, a craftsman who has continued to hone his skills at a town factory, finds himself in a predicament when he has a dispute with a client and stops getting loans from banks. After many years of hard work, he finally collapses, but he awakens in a different world where he meets Frau, a girl who aspires to become a hero. 

With the benefit of modern technology and decades of crafting skill, can Takumi take this new world by storm?

description.ja:
『帝国に舞い降りた精霊姫』と名高い聖女・シンシアは、実はちょっとお転婆な女の子。ある日、正体を隠して魔物討伐に参加することになったシンシアは、魔物の呪いによって猫にされてしまう！
しかも彼女を敵視する皇帝・イザークに拾われて飼い猫になってしまい…。
聖女とバレたら即処刑!?　溺愛される猫と嫌われ（？）聖女のすれ違い二重生活ラブコメディ！

His name is Itou Hiroyuki, nickname: Hiro-kun. He's a math teacher at the private Taihei Academy, as well as the homeroom teacher of class 3-3. He's young, cool, and tall, and yet, when he's with the male students, it's impossible to tell who are the students. He's the person I love.

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~

description.cs: Jsem Yuki a nidky to nepřiznám. Nikdy. To co bych nikdy neudělala je přiznat se k tomi, že mám možná menší slabost pro mého drzého krásného spolužáka – který se chová jako nehorázný spratek – Naruse. Když už se o něm bavíme, místo toho, aby se soustředil na svou zvláštní středoškolní rivalitu s nějakým klukem jménem Shizuka, tak by se měl pustit do hry a soustředit se na náš kvalifikační zápas…!! Možná jsem toho od něj nakonec čekala až moc…
description.en: I, Yuki, have no intention of admitting it. Never. The last thing I will ever do is plead guilty to the crime of maybe possibly having a soft spot for my cheeky playboy of an underclassman—who’s an absolute brat—Naruse. Speaking of which, instead of focusing on his strange grade school rivalry with this Shizuka guy, he needs to get his head in the game and focus on our qualifiers…!! Maybe I was expecting too much from him, after all…
description.pt-br: Machida Yuki sabe que não quer nada com Naruse Shou. Mas como evitá-lo quando ela gerencia o grupo de basquete em que ele participa?!

description.en: Hamaji Youhei, a freshman in high school, lives his life aimlessly, lazing around all day. He can't keep up with his studies, no good at sports and won't stick with anything for long. Besides that he's a pervert who's continuously rejected by girls. A sophomore convinces him into joining a club where he could lunge at girls, fondling and touching all he wanted. Thus he joined the Water Polo Club. Can Youhei, who never sticks with anything for long, find his place in this club?
description.pt:
Hamaji Youhei, é um calouro do colegial, uma vida sem rumo, sem fazer nada o dia todo. Ele não é bom nos estudos, nos esportes e não dura muito tempo em lugar nenhum. alem disso ele é um pervertido que está continuamente sendo rejeitados pelas garotas. um colegial do 2º ano convence ele a entrar em um clube onde pudesse agarrar as garotas, acariciando e tocando tudo o que ele quiser. Assim, ele se juntou ao Clube de Polo Aquático. Pode Youhei, que nunca dura em lugar nenhum por muito tempo, encontrar seu lugar nesse clube?

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone.

That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty

description.en:
Kashimir grew up working as a mercenary to buy medicine for her precious younger half-sister, Aria.

On her way home, after completing a mission as usual, she tripped and hit her head, causing her to remember her past life; thus she realized she had been reborn in the world of the novel *The Night of the Fairy*. Her sister was the main character of this reverse-harem romance while she was one of the villains causing Aria to suffer hardships. 

Since there is no way Kashumir would let her precious sister suffer, she vowed to protect Aria until her adoption into the count's family, just like in the novel. 

But things turned out differently, and even the male lead candidates, who should've been fish in Aria's pond, all ended up becoming obsessed with Kashumir instead, when all she wanted was to protect her lovely sister.

---
To save her younger sister Aria from her illness, Cassmire Crisis became a mercenary, wielding a sword and shedding blood to pay for her medicine. But when Cassmire suffers a fall one day, memories of her past life as Aria’s wicked stepsister come flooding back. Rather than take up the role of villainess again, Cassmire vows to protect Aria this time. But with Aria doomed by the story to face only hardships, Cassmire must pick up her weapon once more to become her sister’s loyal sword!

---

description.es:
Un día, me caí y recordé mi vida pasada.
En realidad, es una novela de harem inverso donde mi hermana es el personaje principal, y yo era la hija del demonio de sangre loco, el Duque Chrysis.
No era mi intención involucrarme con el Duque Chrysis, pero la enfermedad de mi hermana se deterioró rápidamente y me vi obligada a visitarlo como su hija…
—Mi hija no tiene que arrodillarse ante nadie. Incluso si este fuera el Emperador del Imperio, no necesitarías doblar las rodillas.
El Duque Chrysis, que no tenía sangre ni lágrimas, era un poco extraño.
—Si lloras ante los ojos de mi hermana, solo morirás.
Mi hermana angelical, Aria, también se ennegreció por alguna razón.
—Tú eres quien me salvó la vida, y eres el responsable. ¿Has olvidado la noche que pasaste conmigo?
—Te he admirado durante mucho tiempo. ¿No puedes darme una parte de ti?
—¿No quieres ser reina? Entonces serás el Rey. Seré tu marido.
—La gente piensa que soy el Papa que sirve al Dios Sol, pero ¿sabes que tú eres Dios para mí?
Eran los peces de los caladeros de mi hermana.
¿Estaba loco el mundo?

description.fr:
Née dans la pauvreté, Kashmir a dû prendre soin toute sa vie de sa petite sœur malade, Aria. Pour cela, elle est devenue mercenaire et a travaillé d'arrache-pied pour payer ses médicaments. Or, un jour, Kashmir est violemment tombée sur la tête et s'est remémorée sa vie passée. Elle était en réalité dans un roman d'harem inversé où sa sœur était l'héroïne, et elle, la fille d'un duc sans pitié. Ayant urgemment besoin d'aide pour soigner sa sœur, Kashmir dû rendre visite au père qu'elle ne voulait jamais rencontrer. De plus, l'intrigue du roman original ne cesse d'évoluer; sa gentille sœur, douce et attentionnée, devient impétueuse et les protagonistes masculins qui étaient supposés lui tourner autour comme des mouches, se sont énamourés de Kashmir! Quelles autres surprises attendent la grande épéiste Kashmir?

---
Un jour, je suis tombée et je me suis souvenue de ma vie passée. Il s’agit en fait d’un roman de harem inversé dont ma sœur est le personnage principal, et j’étais la fille du diable sanguinaire fou, le duc Chrysis. Je n’avais pas l’intention de m’engager avec le duc Chrysis, mais la maladie de ma soeur s’est rapidement détériorée et j’ai été obligée de lui rendre visite en tant que sa fille…

«Ma fille n’a pas à s’agenouiller pour qui que ce soit. Même si c’était l’Empereur de l’Empire, tu n’aurais pas besoin de plier les genoux.»

Le Duc Chrysis, qui n’avait ni sang, ni larmes, était un peu étrange.

«Si tu pleures devant les yeux de ma sœur, tu ne pourras que mourir.»

Ma sœur Aria, qui ressemble à un ange, a aussi noirci pour une raison quelconque.

«Tu es celle qui m’a sauvé la vie, et tu es responsable. As-tu oublié la nuit que tu as passée avec moi?»

«Je t’admire depuis longtemps. Ne pouvez-vous pas me donner une partie de vous?»

«Tu ne veux pas être la reine? Alors tu seras le Roi. Je serai ton mari.»

«Les gens pensent que je suis le Pape qui sert le Dieu Soleil, mais sais-tu que ce Dieu est toi pour moi?»

Ils étaient les poissons des lieux de pêche de ma sœur. Le monde était-il fou?

---

description.id:
Cassmire menjadi prajurit bayaran yang tidak pernah melepas pedangnya demi adiknya, Aria yang sakit. Suatu hari, dia terjatuh dan membentur kepala sehingga dia mengingat kehidupan sebelumnya. Ternyata, dia berada dalam novel harem yang mana adiknya adalah pemeran utama dan dia adalah pemeran antagonis yang mengganggu adiknya. Cassmire tidak ingin Aria menjadi sengsara sehingga dia bersumpah untuk jadi pedang setia Aria agar Aria mendapatkan kehidupan yang lebih layak. Tetapi, rencana Cassmire bertolak belakang dengan apa yang terjadi. Semua pemeran utama laki-laki yang harusnya mengejar Aria, berujung mengejar Cassmire. "Aku sudah gila atau dunia sudah gila?"

---
Dia menjadi tentara bayaran untuk mendapatkan uang untuk obat saudaranya yang sakit, dan dia tidak pernah mengambil pedangnya dari tangannya. Kemudian suatu hari, saya jatuh dan teringat kehidupan saya sebelumnya. Ini sebenarnya adalah novel harem terbalik di mana saudara laki-laki saya adalah karakter utama, dan bahwa saya adalah putri dari iblis penggila darah, Duke Christie. Aku tidak berniat untuk terlibat dengan Duke of Christie, tapi penyakit kakakku memburuk dengan cepat, dan aku tidak punya pilihan selain pergi ke Duke's... “Putri saya tidak perlu berlutut kepada siapa pun. Bahkan kaisar kekaisaran ini tidak akan pernah bisa menekuk lututmu lagi. ” Duke Chritie, yang tidak memiliki darah atau air mata, sedikit aneh. “Ketika air mata keluar dari mata Shu-Shu unnie, hanya ada kematian, anak-anak X.” Arya, yang seperti bidadari, juga menjadi hitam karena suatu alasan. “Kamu menyelamatkan hidupmu, jadi kamu harus bertanggung jawab. Apa kau lupa malam yang kau habiskan bersamaku?” “Aku mengagumimu sejak lama. Tidak bisakah kamu memberiku sebagian dari dirimu?" “Kamu tidak ingin menjadi ratu? Maka Anda adalah raja. Aku bukan selir kerajaan. Bisakah koma menjadi kerajaan?” “Orang-orang mengira aku adalah paus yang memuja dewa matahari, tetapi tahukah kamu bahwa kamu sebenarnya adalah dewaku?” Ikan-ikan di tempat pemancingan saudara laki-laki saya juga datang kepada saya untuk bekerja Apakah dunia ini gila?

---

description.ko:
아픈 동생의 약값을 벌기 위해 용병이 되었고,
검을 손에서 뗀 적이 없었다. 그러던 어느 날, 넘어져서 전생을 기억해 버렸으니.
이곳은 사실 동생이 주인공인 역하렘 소설 속이고, 나는 피에 미친 악마, 크리시스 공작의 딸이었다는 것.

크리시스 공작과 엮일 생각은 없었건만, 동생의 병이 급격히 악화되어 어쩔 수 없이 공작가로 찾아가게 되었는데…….

“내 딸은 그 누구에게도 무릎 꿇을 필요 없다. 설령 이 제국의 황제라 할지라도, 네 무릎을 다시 굽히게 할 수 없을 것이다.”
피도 눈물도 없다는 크리시스 공작이 조금 이상하다.
“슈슈 언니 눈에서 눈물 나면 죽음뿐이다, X자식들아.”

천사 같던 여동생 아리아도 왜인지 흑화를 했다.

“그대가 살려준 목숨이니 그대가 책임을 져야지. 나와 함께 보낸 밤을 잊은 건가?”
“아주 오랫동안 당신을 동경했습니다. 당신의 일부라도 내게 내어줄 수 없는 겁니까?”
“왕후가 되기 싫어? 그럼 그대가 국왕 해. 내가 국왕 부군 하지. 혼수는 왕국이면 되나?”
“사람들은 내가 태양신을 섬기는 교황이라고 생각하지만, 사실 내게 신은 당신이란 거 아나요?”

동생 어장 속 물고기들도 내게 작업을 걸어온다.세상이 미친 걸까?

---

description.pt:
Um dia, eu caí e me lembrei da minha vida passada.

Na verdade, é um romance de harém reverso onde minha irmã é a personagem principal, e eu era filha do demônio de sangue louco Duke Chrysis. Eu não queria me envolver com o duque Chrysis, mas a doença de minha irmã se deteriorou rapidamente e fui forçada a visitá-lo como sua filha…

“Minha filha não precisa se ajoelhar para ninguém. Mesmo se este fosse o Imperador do Império, você não precisaria dobrar os joelhos.”
O duque Chrysis, que não tinha sangue nem lágrimas, era um pouco estranho.

“Se você chorar diante dos olhos da minha irmã, você só vai morrer.”
Minha irmã angelical, Aria, também escureceu por algum motivo.

“Você é o único que salvou minha vida, e você é o responsável. Você se esqueceu da noite que passou comigo?

“Eu admiro você há muito tempo. Você não pode me dar uma parte de você?”

“Você não quer ser rainha? Então você será o Rei. Eu serei seu marido.”

“As pessoas pensam que eu sou o Papa que serve ao Deus Sol, mas você sabe que Deus é você para mim?”
Eram os peixes dos pesqueiros da minha irmã.
O mundo estava louco?

---

description.ru:
Я стала наёмником, чтобы зарабатывать деньги на лекарства для больной сестры, и с тех пор не расставалась с мечом. Однажды я упала, сильно ударилась головой и вдруг вспомнила свою прошлую жизнь. 
Я попала в роман с гаремом наоборот, где моя сестра была главной героиней, а я – дочерью кровавого безумца, герцога Криса. 
Я не собиралась связываться с герцогом Крисом, но болезнь сестры стремительно прогрессировала, и мне больше ничего не оставалось. 
«Моей дочери не нужно ни перед кем становиться на колени. Даже император не посмеет заставить тебя склониться». 
Странно, что герцог обошёлся без крови и никого не довёл до слёз. 
«Гибель ублюдков не идёт ни в какое сравнение со слезами сестры Шеше». 
Арья, которая была похожа на ангела, почему-то стала злобной. 
«Ты спасла мою жизнь, поэтому ты должна взять на себя ответственность. Разве забыла ту ночь, что провела со мной?» 
«Я давно восхищаюсь тобой. Ты не можешь обратить на меня хоть толику своего внимания?» 
«Не хочешь стать королевой? Тогда я буду королем. Королём и мужем. Хочешь короля в приданое?» 
«Люди думают, что я святой отец, служащий богу солнца. Но они не знают, что мои истинная богиня - это ты». 
Рыбки из пруда младшей сестрички оказались в моих угодьях. 
Мир сошел с ума?

---

description.uk:
Я стала найманцем, щоб заробити на ліки хворій сестрі. Меч ніколи не полишав моїх рук. Одного разу я впала та згадала минуле життя.
Насправді це зворотній гарем з моєю мололдшою сестрою в якості головної героїні!
Я кровожерливий диявол, донька герцога Кріссі. У мене не було намірів зв'язуватися з герцогом, але хвороба моєї сестри погіршилась і мені довелося звернутися до нього.

-Моя донька не мусить ні перед ким ставати на коліна. Навіть якщо він імператор, ти не вклонишся.
Герцог Кірсі не мав ні крихти жалю і людяності! Це дивно.
-Якщо ти заплачеш - тебе очікує сммерть, неправильна дитино.

Моя сестра Ар'я, схожа на янгола, теж чомусь згнітилася.

-Ти врятувала це життя, тож повинна взяти на себе відповідальність. Ти забула ніч яку провела зі мною?

-Я дуже довго сумував за тобою. Хіба не можеш ти стати частиною мене?

-Хіба не хочеш ти стати королевою? Я тебе короную. Твоїм чоловіком стане правитель. І все королівство отримаєш в якості приданого?

-Люди вважають що я верховний жрець, прихильник Бога Сонця, але чи знаєш ти, що лише ти мій Бог?

Ще одна проблема - моя сестра стала об'ктом цікавості багатьох чоловіків.

Світ зійшов зглузду?

---

description.vi:
Một ngày nọ, tôi ngã xuống và nhớ lại kiếp trước của mình.

Nó thực sự là một cuốn tiểu thuyết hậu cung ngược trong đó chị gái tôi là nhân vật chính, còn tôi là con gái của Công tước Chrysis, quỷ máu điên. Tôi không có ý định dính líu đến Công tước Chrysis, nhưng bệnh tình của chị tôi xấu đi nhanh chóng và tôi buộc phải đến thăm anh ấy với tư cách là con gái của anh ấy…

“Con gái tôi không cần phải quỳ gối trước bất kỳ ai. Ngay cả khi đây là Hoàng đế của Đế quốc, bạn sẽ không cần phải khuỵu gối."
Công tước Chrysis, người không có máu, không có nước mắt, hơi kỳ lạ.

"Nếu bạn khóc trước mắt em gái tôi, bạn sẽ chỉ có chết."
Em gái như thiên thần của tôi, Aria, cũng bị đen đi vì một lý do nào đó.

“Bạn là người đã cứu mạng tôi và bạn phải chịu trách nhiệm. Anh đã quên cái đêm bên em rồi sao?”

“Tôi đã ngưỡng mộ bạn từ rất lâu rồi. Bạn có thể cho tôi một phần của bạn không?”

“Bạn không muốn trở thành Nữ hoàng? Sau đó, bạn sẽ là Vua. Tôi sẽ là chồng của bạn."

“Mọi người nghĩ rằng tôi là Giáo hoàng, người phục vụ Thần Mặt trời, nhưng bạn có biết rằng đối với tôi Chúa là bạn không?”
Chúng là những con cá ở ngư trường của chị tôi.
Thế giới có điên không?

---

description.zh-hk:
我為了給生病的妹妹賺藥錢而成為了傭兵， 劍也從未從我手中掉落過。

然而在某一天，我摔倒後，回想起了前世的記憶。

這裡其實是以我妹妹為女主人公的逆后宮小說中的世界， 而我是浴血而狂的惡魔，克里西斯公爵的女兒。

雖然我沒有和克里西斯公爵扯上關係的打算， 但妹妹的病情急速惡化，無路可走的我只能找去了公爵家……

“我的女兒不必向任何人屈膝，即便是這個帝國的皇帝，也不能讓你跪下。” 據說是無情冷血的克里西斯公爵有點奇怪。

“你們要是惹修修姐姐流淚就給我去死吧，臭SB們。” 像天使一樣的妹妹阿利雅也不知道為何黑化了。

“你救下的命你要負責。你忘記和我度過的那一晚了嗎？” “我一直都很憧憬你。你不能交給我你的一部分嗎？”

“不想成為皇后？那你當國王吧，我當國王的夫君。嫁妝就送上整個王國可以嗎？” “雖然大家都認為我是侍奉太陽神的教皇，但你知道嗎？其實你才是我的神。”

妹妹漁場裡養的魚也都闖入我的工作中，這世界是出毛病了嗎？

---

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.

Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

description.en: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee, but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice, they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly, Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind, considerate, knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today, the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people, making their day a little better.
description.es: Sakurai parece un delincuente, pero inmediatamente aconseja a la gente que encuentra. Aquellos que lo conocen por primera vez se asustan frecuentemente con su apariencia amenazante, pero a través de sus consejos, se dan cuenta de que tan querido y bueno puede ser. Lentamente, el círculo de allegados de Sakurai empieza a crecer. El es bueno, considerado, con experiencia y versatilidad en todos lo deportes! Hoy, el super-adepto Sakurai, quien tiene una brecha enorme entre su apariencia y su personalidad, continúa dandole consejos inmediatos a varias personas, mejorándoles su día un poquito.
description.pt-br: Sakurai-san parece um yankee, mas dá às pessoas que passa um conselho pontual. Aqueles que o encontram pela primeira vez muitas vezes ficam assustados com sua aparência assustadora, mas através dos conselhos, eles aprendem como ele pode ser bondoso. Lentamente, o círculo de pessoas de Sakurai começou a crescer. Ele é gentil, atencioso, experiente e versátil em todas as formas de esportes … !! Hoje, o superespecial Sakurai, que tem uma lacuna ridícula em sua aparência e personalidade, continua a dar conselhos de um ponto para várias pessoas, tornando seu dia um pouco melhor.

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

description.en: Atalanta, the head of an underground organization, is infamous for committing violent acts against nobles. One day, she receives a commission from the Emperor to assassinate the tyrant Grand Duke Lionel Bianca. Atalanta dreams of a future where her and the members of her organization can live a normal life, so she accepts the commission and infiltrates the Grand Duchy to assassinate him… But, why can’t he be killed? Will Atalanta be able to safely escape from the Grand Duke, who is suddenly whispering confessions of love?
description.ko:
귀족들을 상대로 악명을 떨치던 제국 뒷세계 조직의 보스, 아탈란테. 
어느 날 황제로부터 폭군 리오넬 비안크 대공을 암살해 달라는 의뢰를 받게 된다.
조직원들과 평범하게 살고 싶었던 아탈란테는 의뢰를 수락하고 
대공성에 잠입해 암살 시도하는데….
하지만 어째서인지 죽지 않아?
한순간에 사랑을 속삭이는 대공에게서 아탈란테는 무사히 탈출할 수 있을까?

Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.

description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….

description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.

[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

description.en:
This is a one-panel manga that illustrates girls in different situations, such as "girls that changed seats next to the person they like" and "girls who eat a lot are cute."

This is a compilation of Twitter posts. This also includes a Twitter poll to see which girls the readers liked the most.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=1465143)
description.ru:
Это однопанельная манга, иллюстрирующая девушек в различных ситуациях, таких как "девушки, которые поменяли место рядом с человеком, который им нравится" и "девушки, которые много едят, симпатичные".

Это компиляция сообщений в Твиттере. Сюда также входит опрос в Твиттере, чтобы узнать, какие девушки больше всего понравились читателям.

altTitles.ja-ro: DEAR BOYS ACTII

description.en: With its long-awaited freshman/student athletes aboard, Mizuho High's basketball team practices with a hope to play in the national tournaments. In the prefectural preliminary games, the young athletes compete with their rivals at Shonandai-Sagami, Honmoku-Higashi and Yokohama Gakuen Highs. Will Mizuho compete in the national tournaments and once again confront Narita-Chuo and Meiwadai-Hitachi Highs? And finally how will the players fare in a game against the high school basketball champion team at Tendoji? The struggles of the newly reborn Mizuho basketball team to become the national champion begin!

title.en: Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?

altTitles.vi: Vậy Để Tôi Giết Chúng Thay Cậu Nhé?

altTitles.ja: じゃあ、君の代わりに殺そうか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?

altTitles.en: Well, Shall I Murder Instead of You?

description.en: The manga centers on Yūma Fujikura, a constantly bullied first year high school student. When a classmate named Ryō Amezato, nicknamed "Amelie," helps him out one day, Yūma tells him not to get any more involved, or else the bullies will target Amelie too. In response to this, Amelie only tells Yūma that he would commit murder for him if Yūma wanted.
description.vi: Cậu đã giải thoát tôi khỏi những tháng ngày tuyệt vọng vì bị bắt nạt…. Nhưng sau khi cậu xuất hiện, một địa ngục mới lại bắt đầu… Cậu rốt cuộc là ai? Tôi có thể tin ai đây?

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

altTitles.ja: ギャルせん

altTitles.ja-ro: Gal Sen
Gyaru Sensei

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

title.ja-ro: Naze Boku no Sekai wo Daremo Oboeteinai no ka?

altTitles.vi: Phy Sew lu, ele tis Es feo r-delis ec I.

altTitles.en: Why Doesn't Anybody Remember My World?

altTitles.ja: なぜ僕の世界を誰も覚えていないのか？

altTitles.en: Why Does Nobody Remember Me in This World?

altTitles.zh-hk: 為何無人記得我的世界？

altTitles.zh: 为何无人记得我的世界？

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"  
The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power. Thus begins the quest of one boy, forgotten by the world, to take back the future!

altTitles.ja: マキナさんのママならない日々

altTitles.ja-ro: Makina-san no Mama Naranai Hibi

altTitles.en: Makina's Days of Not Being a Mom

description.en:
I am a babysitting android named MAK-17.
My plentiful interactions with babies have helped me develop something like a "heart".
No matter how many times I'm sold to a recycling shop, meeting new babies brings light into my life.
Now, I wonder what kind of baby I'll meet next?
N-...no matter how I look at him... he's an "adult", right...?

title.en: Juunenme, Kikan wo Akirameta Tenisha wa Imasara Shujinkou ni naru

altTitles.ja: 十年目、帰還を諦めた転移者はいまさら主人公になる

altTitles.en: On The 10th Year, The Transferee Who Gave Up Returning Finally Becomes The Protagonist

altTitles.ja-ro: Juunenme, Kikan wo Akirameta Tenisha wa Imasara Shujinkou ni Naru

description.en:
Ten years after being transported to another world.

It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first, felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan, after being unsuccessful for so long. 

It was then that a job offer found its way to him— it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.
description.ja: 突如、異世界へ転移したトールは、地球に帰還する手段を探し、ソロ冒険者として活動するが、九年間手掛かりを得る事が出来なかった…。十年目にしてこの世界で生きていく事を決意したトールだったが、ある依頼による“訳ありの双子”との出会いがトールの運命を大きく変える事になり!? ぼっち最強冒険者と頭脳明晰な双子とゆく、気ままな文明開化の異世界旅が始まる！

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**

- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyôhu

altTitles.ja: 恐怖

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

altTitles.ja: 半妖の夜叉姫

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanyou No Yashahime: Sengoku Otogizoushi

altTitles.ja: ～異伝・絵本草子～ 半妖の夜叉姫

description.en:
Can the three teenage daughters of demon dog half-brothers Inuyasha and Sesshomaru 
save their parents, themselves, and both realms from the menace of the seven mystical Rainbow Pearls?

Living in the present day isn’t easy for Sesshomaru’s daughter Towa. 
She can’t remember where she came from, must conceal her mysterious powers, 
and is either worshiped or feared by girls she just wants to be friends with. 
But she has no way of returning to her own time until the day 
a demon attacks and she is transported to feudal-era Japan.

There Towa, her twin sister Setsuma, and her cousin Moroha —Inuyasha’s daughter—
have a mission bestowed upon them by the mystical Tree of Ages. 
With only vague memories of their past to guide them, the three young women set out to find their parents, 
heal a rift in time, and fulfill their royal destiny...

altTitles.ja: コンデ・コマ

description.en:
This manga tells the legacy of Mitsuyo Maeda a Brazilian naturalized as Otávio Maeda, who was a Japanese judōka (judo expert) and prizefighter in no holds barred competitions. He was also known as Count Combat or Conde Koma in Spanish and Portuguese, a nickname he picked up in Spain in 1908. Along with Antônio Soshihiro Satake (another naturalized Brazilian), he pioneered judo in Brazil, the United Kingdom, and other countries.  
  
Maeda was fundamental to the development of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, including through his teaching of Carlos Gracie and others of the Gracie family. He was also a promoter of Japanese emigration to Brazil. Maeda won more than 2,000 professional fights in his career. His accomplishments led to him being called the "toughest man who ever lived" and being referred to as the father of Brazilian Jiu-jitsu.

description.en: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor, even if she has no education, even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter, Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter, who looks nothing like her, and today as well, she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.
description.ja: 紗江子は幸せだ。貧乏でも、学歴がなくても、シングルマザーでも。ただ一人、娘の唯さえいれば。美しい紗江子は全く似ていないブサイクな娘を溺愛し、娘のために今日も幸せをかき集める——どんな手を使っても…。

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

description.en:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.fr:
Le quotidien de l’étudiant ordinaire qu’est Hajime Nagumo, dont la vie ne se comporte que de nuits blanches et siestes en cours, se retrouve bouleversé lorsque sa classe et lui se retrouvent transportés en tant qu’héros dans un autre monde afin de le sauver… Alors que tout le monde obtient des jobs assez puissants, notre héros se retrouve avec le job « Synergiste », assez inutile en l’état des choses, humilié et jeté seul dans les tréfonds d’un donjon, arrivera-t-il à survivre ?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.it:
Tra gli studenti trasportati in un altro mondo, Nagumo Hajime è uno studente senza ambizioni ed aspirazioni nella vita, è infatti soprannominato l’Incapace dai suoi compagni.
Gli studenti sono stati evocati per ergersi ad eroi e salvare il paese dalla distruzione. A loro sono stati donati poteri e classi di livello, a tutti tranne che a Nagumo Hajime, che inizia da Sinergista con statistiche mediocri.
Il Sinergista, è in altre parole un “crafter”. Essendo il più debole, finisce per cadere nelle profondità di un abisso durante l'esplorazione di un sotterraneo. 
Cosa troverà nelle profondità dell’abisso... e riuscirà a sopravvivere?
description.pl:
Wśród uczniów klasy przeniesionej do innego świata, Hajime Nagumo niczym się nie wyróżnia; ot najzwyklejszy w świecie uczeń niemający ambicji czy życiowego celu, dlatego też nazywany w klasie "Nieudacznikiem".
Gdy cała klasa trafiła do innego świata, by zostać bohaterami i ocalić cały kraj przed zniszczeniem, wszyscy zostali pobłogosławieni oszukańczymi statystykami i świetnymi profesjami… za wyjątkiem Hajime, który skończył z profesją "Synergetyka" i przeciętnymi statystykami. "Synergetyk", ujmując to inaczej, jest zwyczajną klasą rzemieślniczą. Będąc najsłabszym w klasie, spada w głąb otchłani podczas wspólnego eksplorowania lochu. Czego dowiedział się w jej czeluściach i czy uda mu się przetrwać?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.ru:
Хадзимэ Нагумо, живущий по принципу «Первым делом - хобби», и весь его класс вдруг призывают в другой мир. Одноклассники один за другим открывают невероятные по меркам этого мира способности, ну а Хадзимэ достается бесполезный ремесленный класс «Синергист». Оказавшись в самых глубинах преисподней, он находит применения своему заурядному таланту и стремится найти выход из лабиринта…  


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.es-la:
Entre la clase transportada a otro mundo, Nagumo Hajime es un estudiante normal y corriente que no tiene ambiciones ni aspiraciones en la vida, por lo que sus compañeros le llaman "Incompetente".
La clase fue convocada para convertirse en héroes y salvar a un país de la destrucción. Los estudiantes de la clase fueron bendecidos con habilidades tramposas y una categoría de trabajo genial, sin embargo, no fue el caso de Hajime, con su profesión de "Sinergista", y sus estadísticas muy mediocres. "Sinergista", para decirlo en otra palabra era simplemente la clase artesanal. Siendo el más débil, entonces cae a la profundidad del abismo cuando él y sus compañeros estaban explorando una mazmorra. ¿Qué encontró en la profundidad del abismo, y podrá sobrevivir?
description.pt-br: Entre a turma transportada para outro mundo, Nagumo Hajime é um estudante do sexo masculino comum que não tem ambição nem aspiração na vida, e, portanto, chamado de " incompetente" por seus colegas. A classe foi convocada para se tornar heróis e salvar um país da destruição. Os alunos da classe foram abençoados com as especificações de trapaça e classes legais, no entanto, não foi o caso com Hajime , com a sua profissão como um " Synergist " , e suas estatísticas muito medíocres. "Synergist", para colocá-lo em outras palavrsa era apenas a classe dos artesãos. Sendo o mais fraco , então ele cai para a profundidade do abismo , quando ele e seus colegas estavam explorando uma dungeon. O que ele encontra na profundidade do abismo, e ele pode sobreviver?

title.en: The Struggle of Being Reincarnated as the Marquess's Daughter: I'll Deal with What's Coming to Me!

altTitles.ja: 転生侯爵令嬢奮闘記 わたし, 立派にざまぁされてみせます!

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Koushaku Reijou Funtouki: Watashi, Rippa ni Zamaa sarete Misemasu!

altTitles.en: The Struggles of a Reincarnated Marquess's Daughter--- I'll be taken down in Style!

description.en: One day, the Marquess’s daughter Julianne suddenly regained the memories of her previous life and reflected on her behavior up to this point. A life of luxury, bullying her siblings and stalking her fiancé…… A horrible personality and overweight appearance, devoted only to wrongdoings that belonged to the villainess of the novel she read in her past life. In any case if it is a "serves you right" fate from now on, then it will be after I get a beautiful body and soul! She, who thought this, started a diet together with showing a wholehearted devotion to her family —?!

description.fr: Le prochain directeur de l'hôtel Woo Myung-sung a été élevé comme "œuvre d'art" par son père. Myong-sung, qui semblait parfait sous tous les aspects, était en fait en train de perdre sa motivation à vivre, épuisé par la pression qu'il avait endurée depuis son enfance. Puis un jour, Woo Myung-sung a rencontré un camarade du lycée qui distribuait du poulet. Je veux transmettre mes compétences en rendez-vous à Jeonsu, qui se réveille comme une poupée qu'il aime, change d'humeur et révèle honnêtement toutes ses émotions comme un idiot. "Essaye, embrasse, apprends."

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
